title: Reach Out
subtitle: Tell me what you’re building.
metaDescription: Contact Harrison Callahan — talk through a role or project. Short call, clear next steps, and a reply within a day.
introduction:
# Let's talk details

I build full‑stack tools for experiential teams. If you've got a role or a project in mind, I'm happy to walk through it and outline options. Short calls or async is fine.

If you have one, send a repo, problem statement, or Figma. I usually reply within a day.
